settings.overlay_title: Your Legacy Enabling Future Health Care

settings.title: Care Forward:
settings.description: Your legacy enables exceptional health care for generations to come

settings.title: Care Forward with a gift in your Will to create the future of health care right here.
settings.text: A gift in your Will can be the promise of a future for exceptional health care delivered with kindness, care and compassion. You can create a lasting impact on the health of your community—simply by planning ahead. Planned gifts provide Grand River Hospital with future funding, allowing us to respond to needs and provide patients with the world-class care they need and deserve.

settings.title: Legacy Champions
settings.text: When you leave a gift to Grand River Hospital Foundation through a bequest, life insurance policy, trust or other estate plan, you can become a member in our Care Forward community.

settings.title: Have you left a gift already?
settings.text:
If you have already included us in your will—thank you!  We would like to know so we can thank you and ensure your gift is recognized the way you would like it to be.

When you leave a gift to Grand River Hospital Foundation through a bequest, life insurance policy, trust or other estate plan, you can become a member in our Care Forward community.

Benefits of Membership

Members of Care Forward enjoy special benefits that bring them closer to the excellent health care they make possible:

● Welcome package 
● Invitation to our Care Forward Luncheon and Induction Ceremony
● Annual Care Forward newsletter 

Our Care Forward community is incredibly special to our organization and we want to make sure that our donors know how grateful we are for their gift.

At the core of every world class community are people who care – people who care about the work they do, the community they live in and the chance to make a difference.  At Grand River Hospital Foundation, we see that passion and dedication in our community and work in partnership with our supporters to make every health care experience exceptional.

Our region is one of the youngest in Canada, with almost 22% of our population under the age of 18. Last year alone, more than 4,300 babies entered the world at Grand River Hospital.

A gift in your Will today can mean an extraordinary tomorrow for the people of our community — your children, grandchildren, other families, youth and seniors. Your future gift will be used to support:

● Essential care equipment such as bassinets, dialysis chairs, cardiac monitors and patient beds

● Innovative programs as part of cancer care services, mental health care, kidney care, seniors care and Grand River Kids

● Specialized health research and continuous learning opportunities for health teams on our world class care platforms

● Patient experience programs like spiritual care, Grand Serve digital services, medical imaging and radiology

Planning a charitable gift to Grand River as part of your legacy will have a lasting impact for those on their health care journey. If you wish to designate your gift to particular areas of care, research or equipment, please give us a call so we can understand your wishes and intentions. As always, please consult your professional advisor for expert advice. We hope you feel confident in knowing how your gift can and will be used by Grand River Hospital and look forward to answering any questions that may arise.

We also invite you to take a look at Will Power, a national movement made up of charities, financial advisors and legal professionals across the country, working together to show Canadians that they have the power to make a difference through their Will. You may be delighted to know that even a small percentage of your estate left to your favourite charity in your Will can make a meaningful difference to health care while still providing for your loved ones.

settings.title: Ready now? Start to create your legacy.
settings.text:
Thank you for considering leaving a future gift in support of Grand River Hospital. We are here to help with any planned giving questions you may have. Our team would be delighted to work with you to ensure your gift supports the program of your choice and that your wishes are fulfilled—we will happily get you all the information you need.

If you are looking for more information, please reach out to Betty Bax, Director, Philanthropy & Planned Giving by email or phone at 519-580-5108, or book a meeting with her directly.

settings.title: Your professional advisor can help you leave a planned gift to the hospital.
settings.text:
Important details to include are:

Our Legal Name: Grand River Hospital Foundation
Our Address: 835 King Street West, Kitchener, ON N2G 1G3
Our Charitable Business Number: 88918 0394 RR0001

settings.title: Benefits of Membership
settings.text:
Members of Care Forward enjoy special benefits that bring them closer to the excellent health care they make possible:

● Welcome package 
● Invitation to our Care Forward Luncheon and Induction Ceremony
● Listing on our Donor Recognition Wall (with your permission)
● Annual Care Forward newsletter 

Our Care Forward community is incredibly special to our organization and we want to make sure that our donors know how grateful we are for their gift.
